section.name: What are Services?
section.p:
Services are InfoQuivers heart. Basically InfoQuiver is just an Application which starts and/or schedules services.
In theory you could create a complete different application just by implementing and configuring your own services. InfoQuiver (as application for automatic querying and indexing of many kinds of information datasources) consists of five core services:
ContentFetchService
ContentSearchService
ReportCompileService
ContentCollectorService
XmlRpcServer
Here is InfoQuivers abstract service class diagram as the time of this writing:
As you can see there exists one abstract base class (net.sf.iquiver.service.BaseService) which contains allmost all common functionality required by the InfoQuiver daemon.
